p.s: Bianca L. is a German volunteer who worked at an Education Center for children in a slum of Delhi.
She wrote about her experiences and her view on volunteering.
Her daily routine was very structured but her main focus were the children.
She describes how much joy they brought her and that their way of thinking and dealing with things are truelytruly something you should be impressed of.
Bianca described how thankfullthankful she was after her experience in Delhi and how the children filled her with love, patience and hope.
They showed so much interesseinterest in her and her life, that she learned to love them in a very short time.
All the days she spend with them were the best days in her life and she said that it was an experience she will never forget.
